description: List of sizes of conjugacy classes of Mathieu simple group M_24 of order 244823040.
comments: Equally, list of orders of elements of Mathieu group M_24.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups, Oxford Univ. Press, 1985.
example: The conjugacy classes and the orders of their centralizers are:1A 2448230402A 215042B 76803A 10803B 5044A 3844B 1284C 965A 606A 246B 247A 427B 428A 1610A 2011A 1112A 1212B 1214A 1414B 1415A 1515B 1521A 2121B 2123A 2323B 23
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_. Entry revised Apr 07 2009
